thread.section_title: The Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: So very English
thread.title_full: So very English - Review of The Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: allorasprings
title: So very English
text:
This was our first trip to London in 36 years so i wanted a hotel to meet certain criteria, one being its sense of place.
This georgious property was just perfect, it has great character, friendly and well trained staff, lovely rooms and its position unbeatable for our needs. Cant wait to return and now that our daughter lives in London it should be a lot more often!
